'''Memory of Roving Gales''' is a [[Constellation Activation Material]] item. It is used to unlock [[Constellation]]s for the [[Traveler]] when aligned with the [[Anemo]] element. This is different than other characters, who all use their respective [[Stella Fortuna]] to upgrade Constellations.

==How To Obtain==
You can obtain up to 6 copies of this item, through various means.
# Reward for completing {{Quest|For a Tomorrow Without Tears}}
# Reward for completing {{Quest|Song of the Dragon and Freedom}}
# Sold by [[Marjorie]] in [[Souvenir Shop]], With Wind Comes Glory (limit 1, for 225 [[Anemo Sigil]]s)
# Reward for reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 27
# Reward for reaching Adventure Rank 37
# Reward for reaching Adventure Rank 46
